project.name: |-- 001-java5-futures
project.description:
Keywords: + Future
This project includes a very simple example that illustrates the use of Futures (introduced by Java 5) to perform async programming.
FutureRunner: Demonstrates how to perform an async task using Future wrapper. The application submits a lengthy task for execution in a separate thread and then performs some other stuff concurrently. Then it waits for the lengthy computation to either timeout or finish.
